Armour.Name: Cloak of the Timeless
Armour.Description: A cloak that shimmers with threads of pure time, wrapping its wearer in moments past and future.
Armour.DefensiveCapabilities: Has a chance to rewind time, negating the damage from one attack per battle.

Armour.Name: Boots of the Windwalker
Armour.Description: Boots that carry the blessing of the ancient deity of wind, granting swiftness to the wearer.
Armour.DefensiveCapabilities: Increases movement speed, allowing for faster evasion.

Armour.Name: Mask of Visions
Armour.Description: A mask that reveals the weak points of enemies, crafted from the essence of foresight.
Armour.DefensiveCapabilities: Improves critical hit chance by revealing enemy vulnerabilities.
